name: Sculpute Aloy Horizon'
details:
Anyone who has had the chance to play Horizon Zero Dawn ends up falling in love with Aloy, which is why it was worth having a hyper-realistic bust of her in my store.

Completely handcrafted and painted

name: Sculpture Rengoku
details:
Handcrafted and painted RENG0KU bust.
This is a version of the character from the anime made by me.

name: Sculpture The Batman
details:
Robert Pattinson's Batman, but in pink.
Why not make the darkest superhero in the world in such a color?
Modeled in monster clay and epoxy putty. Cast in polyurethane resin.

Materials: resin, acrylic paint.

21 cm height.

name: Sculpute Spinelli
details:
The updated version of Spinelli from *Recess*.
Handcrafted and painted through a traditional process. The Spinelli in the photos is a prototype.
If you want your own, I'll make one for you. That's why the shipping process takes 5 to 7 days.

Materials: resin, acrylic paint.

29 cm height.

name: Statue Monkey D.Luffy: One Piece. 3D Resin
details:
Set sail for adventure with this incredible Monkey D. Luffy figure! Capturing the essence of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain, this collectible piece is a must-have for any One Piece fan.

Amazing Details: Every detail, from his iconic straw hat to his dynamic pose, has been meticulously sculpted and hand-painted.

High-Quality Resin: Printed in premium 3D resin, this figure offers exceptional durability and a detailed finish.

Hand-Painted: Each figure is unique, with hand-painted details that highlight Luffy's vibrant personality.

Perfect Collectible: Ideal for One Piece fans and collectors of anime and manga figures.

Impactful Decoration: With its dynamic design and vibrant colors, this figure will become the centerpiece of any space.

Add Luffy to your crew and start your own adventure!

name: Tony Stark & Iron Man
details:
Tony Stark & Iron Man: Duality of a Genius with Illumination

Capture the essence of Tony Stark with this impressive dual figure, featuring both the billionaire genius and his alter ego, Iron Man. Standing at 40 cm tall for Iron Man, this piece is a tribute to the iconic superhero.

Realistic Details: Tony Stark features realistic skin, while Iron Man sports an impeccable metallic finish.

LED Illumination: The platform features integrated LED lighting, highlighting the figure and creating a spectacular visual effect.

Hand-Painted: Every detail has been meticulously hand-painted, ensuring a unique and high-quality piece.

Resin Print: Made with high-quality resin, this figure offers exceptional durability and a detailed finish.

Impressive Dimensions: With dimensions of 40 cm x 30 cm x 30 cm, this figure becomes the centerpiece of any collection.
